title: Which video game is scientifically proven to improve concentration (sustained attention)? - Quora

response.answer_text: While video games are perhaps good for facilitating attention span, for actually maintaining brain function against the ravages of dementia, one's time is much better spent doing crossword puzzles. Has to do with the exercising of long-term memory, among other things perhaps.
Regarding neurology, what works, for some, for sustained attention is a medicine like Dilantin (for epilepsy) or a medicine like caffeine or Ritalin (for ADHD). X-ref: Neurology vs Video Games
